description: Rapid Charging DUAL-ion+ ReVIVE Series Camera Battery Charger for OEM LP-E6 / LPE6Quickly Charge Two Batteries at Once.The Dual-ion+ is a super fast 1000mA charger for a single battery or 500mA for 2, charging your batteries at record speeds! It fully charges 2 batteries in just 3 hours!Charge Your Batteries Anywhere with AC & DC Adapters & World Ready VoltageThe Dual-ion+ Charger comes with AC & DC charging cables to charge at home & in the car. The AC adapter supports 100-240v, so you can travel the world & still quickly charge your batteries!Improve, Protect & Extend the Life of Your BatteriesTwo-way microchip communication offers auto-cutoff & trickle charging. Once your batteries have reached full capacity the Dual-ion+ automatically cuts the standard charging current & begins trickle charging - delivering 5% of the standard current to ensure your batteries stay at full capacity.Take Guesswork Out of Charging Your BatteriesThe Dual-ion+ features 2 LED power displays that monitor the progress of each battery. 4 red blinking LED lights indicate when batteries are at 25%, 50%, 75%, & 100% charge levels. When the lights shut off, the battery is full.2 Different Batteries to Charge? No Problem!Designed with an interchangeable plate interface, the Dual-ion+ allows you to charge additional batteries. With voltage auto-detection from 3.6v to 8.4v, it's compatible with a wide variety of popular brands.Product Specs:Charger dimensions: 4.25" x 3.25" x 1.25"Input: AC 100-240v; DC 12vAUTO-DETECT CHARGING VOLTAGESingle Output Current: 800mA, 1000mA MAXDouble Output Current: 500mA, 800mA MAXCompatible With:Canon EOS 70D / Canon 70DCanon EOS 5D Mark II / Canon 5D II / 5D Mark 2 / 5D2Canon EOS 5D Mark III / Canon 5D III / 5D Mark 3 / 5D3Canon EOS 6D / Canon 6DCanon EOS 7D / Canon 7DCanon EOS 60D / Canon 60DCanon EOS 60Da / Canon 60Da
title: DUAL-ion+ ReVIVE Series LP-E6 Camera Battery Charger for Canon EOS 60D / 7D / 5D Mark II / 5D Mark III Digital SLR Cameras
